Package org.cyclops.evilcraft.api.tileentity.purifier

Interface IPurifierActionRegistry

All Superinterfaces:
org.cyclops.cyclopscore.init.IRegistry
All Known Implementing Classes:
PurifierActionRegistry
public interface IPurifierActionRegistry extends org.cyclops.cyclopscore.init.IRegistry
Registry for IPurifierAction instances.

    • work

      boolean work(int actionId, BlockEntityPurifier tile)
      Execute a valid Purifier action for the given Purifier tile.
      Parameters:
      actionId - -1 if none of the actions apply, otherwise the actionId that applies.
      tile - The Purifier tile.
      Returns:
      If work is done
